GSD.description:
drivers: usb: host: Fix deadlock in oxu_bus_suspend()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit 2dcec0bc142be2096af71a5703d63237127db204. For more details please see the references link.
